column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Diy_coref|
#Text=[0224] FIG. 26B is a method 750 of operating a DVD player, in accordance with one embodiment of the present invention.
#Text=Method 750 may for example start from block 730 in FIG. 26A.
#Text=In block 752, the DVD menu is presented after stopping the movie.
#Text=Thereafter, in block 754, a determination is made as to whether or not the menu button on the remote control is pressed.
#Text=If pressed, the method proceeds to block 758 where the DVD feature menu and DVD menu are integrated and presented.
#Text=If not pressed, the method proceeds to block 756 where a determination is made as to whether or not a DVD play control has been selected/activated.
#Text=If so, the method proceeds to block 770 where the movie resumes playing at the last marked location.
#Text=If not, the method proceeds back to block 752.
#Text=[0225] Following block 758, the method proceeds to block 760 where a determination is made as to whether or not the menu button has been pressed.
#Text=If pressed, the method proceeds to block 762 where the main menu is presented.
#Text=Thereafter in block 764 a determination is made as to whether or not a DVD feature has been selected/activated.
#Text=If so, the method proceeds back to block 758.
#Text=If not, the method proceeds back to block 762.
#Text=If the menu button is not pressed in block 760, the method proceeds to block 766 where a determination is made as to whether or not a DVD play control has been selected/activated.
#Text=If so, the method proceeds to block 770 where the movie resumes playing at the last marked location.
#Text=If not, the method proceeds back to block 752.
#Text=If not, the method proceeds to block 768 where a determination is made as to whether or not the DVD menu has been selected.
#Text=If so, the method proceeds to block 752.
#Text=If not, the method proceeds back to block 758.
#Text=[0226] As should be appreciated, as shown by this method, the virtual chapter is retained in all the various menus.
#Text=This includes the other media feature menus.
#Text=The user therefore can resume playing the movie even if they exit the DVD menus and enter the music, photo or video menus.
#Text=GUI Examples
#Text=[0227] FIGS. 27-37 show exemplary GUIs representing various layers of a multimedia control center, in accordance with several embodiments of the present invention.
